import './SearchItem.css'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const { data, loading, error } = useFetch(`/hotels/find/${id}`) const SearchItem = ({ item }) => { return (

{item.nume}

{item.distanta}m de centru {data.adresa} Camere Single, Duble si Apartamente* {item.descriere} Anulare gratuita Oferta de ultima ora, rezerva acum camera dorita!
{item.rating &&
Excelent
}
{item.cmipret} RON Include TVA
) } export default SearchItem
